sentence: A magnitude-5.1 earthquake followed by 115 aftershocks shook Los Angeles on Friday night.
The epicenter was in Orange County which is about 20 miles east of downtown Los Angeles.
The boundary between two shifting lands on San Andreas Fault massed responsible for the earthquakes that displaced 83 residents.
The earthquakes caused minor damages including rockslides and water main break but there are no major injuries.
The Red Cross opened a shelter in La Habra while the U.S. Geological Survey is working on a device that is able to alert people to an earthquake four seconds before it is felt.
